20110122110522.000|20110122110525.000|CC1|>> BRACKET INAUDIBLE]           
20110122110525.000|20110122110527.000|CC1|>> WE ACTUALLY DISCUSSED THAT   
20110122110527.000|20110122110531.000|CC1|UPSTAIRS, LOOKING AT CAT SCANS. 
20110122110531.000|20110122110535.000|CC1|NOBODY EVER KNOWS, BUT YOU KIND 
20110122110535.000|20110122110538.000|CC1|OF LOOK AT THIS AND SAY SHE     
20110122110538.000|20110122110539.000|CC1|CERTAINLY COULD HAVE BEEN A LOT 
20110122110539.000|20110122110540.000|CC1|WORSE.                          
20110122110540.000|20110122110542.000|CC1|SHE'S ACTUALLY DOING VERY WELL. 
20110122110542.000|20110122110545.000|CC1|THIS WAS A GUN SHOT WOUND THAT  
20110122110545.000|20110122110546.000|CC1|FORTUNATELY DIDN'T GO CROSS WISE
20110122110546.000|20110122110547.000|CC1|OR RIGHT DOWN THE CENTER.

20110122110549.000|20110122110550.000|CC1|WORSE.                          
20110122110550.000|20110122110551.000|CC1|AND CLEARLY DID NOT DAMAGE LARGE
20110122110551.000|20110122110553.000|CC1|PORTIONS OF HER BRAIN.

20110122110557.000|20110122110557.000|CC1|YEAH?                           
20110122110557.000|20110122110605.000|CC1|>> [INAUDIBLE]                  
20110122110605.000|20110122110608.000|CC1|>> WELL, IT WASN'T THE ONLY     
20110122110608.000|20110122110609.000|CC1|THING BUT IT WAS AN IMPORTANT   
20110122110609.000|20110122110613.000|CC1|THING.                          
20110122110613.000|20110122110617.000|CC1|IT WAS VERY HEART-WRENCHING.    
20110122110617.000|20110122110621.000|CC1|JUST SO, SO WONDERFUL TO SEE THE
20110122110621.000|20110122110625.000|CC1|SUPPORT THAT TUCSON AND ARIZONA 
20110122110625.000|20110122110626.000|CC1|HAS FOR GABBY.                  
20110122110626.000|20110122110627.000|CC1|WE LOVE HER.                    
20110122110627.000|20110122110629.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO MISS HER, BUT    
20110122110629.000|20110122110632.000|CC1|THIS IS WHERE SHE NEEDS TO BE.  
20110122110632.000|20110122110642.000|CC1|>> [INAUDIBLE]                  
20110122110642.000|20110122110644.000|CC1|>> FROM THE MINUTE WE TOOK OFF  
20110122110644.000|20110122110647.000|CC1|TO THE MINUTE WE LANDED, SHE WAS
20110122110647.000|20110122110647.000|CC1|NAPPING.                        
20110122110647.000|20110122110649.000|CC1|SHE WAS INTERACTING WITH HER    
20110122110649.000|20110122110651.000|CC1|MOTHER AND HER HUSBAND.         
20110122110651.000|20110122110652.000|CC1|AS SHE DID EVERY DAY AT THE     
20110122110652.000|20110122110655.000|CC1|HOSPITAL IN TUCSON.             
20110122110655.000|20110122110701.000|CC1|HER MONITORS REGISTERED NO AB   
20110122110701.000|20110122110702.000|CC1|NORMALITIES WHATSOEVER.         
20110122110702.000|20110122110706.000|CC1|IT WAS PLEASANT, SMOOTH AND     
20110122110706.000|20110122110710.000|CC1|FLAWLESS TRANSFER.              
20110122110710.000|20110122110716.000|CC1|>> [INAUDIBLE]                  
20110122110716.000|20110122110718.000|CC1|>> SO I'M GOING TO GO DOWN THE  
20110122110718.000|20110122110720.000|CC1|LINE AND LET THE OTHER GUYS     
20110122110720.000|20110122110720.000|CC1|COMMENT.                        
20110122110720.000|20110122110722.000|CC1|I WOULD SAY THE CARE IN TUCSON, 
20110122110722.000|20110122110724.000|CC1|NUMBER ONE, HAS BEEN            
20110122110724.000|20110122110724.000|CC1|OUTSTANDING.                    
20110122110724.000|20110122110725.000|CC1|SEVERAL VIDEO CONFERENCES OVER  
20110122110725.000|20110122110727.000|CC1|THE LAST COUPLE OF DAYS SHARING 
20110122110727.000|20110122110729.000|CC1|INFORMATION, LOOKING AT SCANS   
20110122110729.000|20110122110730.000|CC1|AND X-RAYS, ET CETERA.          
20110122110730.000|20110122110731.000|CC1|EVERYTHING WE HEARD IN THE LAST 
20110122110731.000|20110122110734.000|CC1|COUPLE OF DAYS WERE CONFIRMED   
20110122110734.000|20110122110734.000|CC1|TODAY.                          
20110122110734.000|20110122110736.000|CC1|THESE GUYS DID A GREAT JOB.     
20110122110736.000|20110122110738.000|CC1|I WANT TO EMPHASIZE, LITTLE BIT 
20110122110738.000|20110122110741.000|CC1|MORE THAN HAND-HOLDING DONE IN  
20110122110741.000|20110122110742.000|CC1|THE EMERGENCY DEPARTMENT WITH   
20110122110742.000|20110122110743.000|CC1|AIR WAY CONTROL AND UP TO THE   
20110122110743.000|20110122110745.000|CC1|OPERATING ROOM WITHIN MINUTES,  
20110122110745.000|20110122110746.000|CC1|OPERATING WITHIN MINUTES IN     
20110122110746.000|20110122110749.000|CC1|TUCSON, WHICH I THINK IS REALLY 
20110122110749.000|20110122110751.000|CC1|EXCELLENT AND AN IMPORTANT PART 
20110122110751.000|20110122110754.000|CC1|OF HER STATUS THAT WE SAW TODAY.
20110122110754.000|20110122110755.000|CC1|DR. KIM, COMMENTS?              
20110122110755.000|20110122110757.000|CC1|>> YEAH, I WOULD LIKE TO SAY    
20110122110757.000|20110122110800.000|CC1|FIRST OF ALL THAT SHE LOOKS     
20110122110800.000|20110122110801.000|CC1|SPECTACULAR.                    
20110122110801.000|20110122110803.000|CC1|FROM A NEUROLOGICAL VIEW FIRST, 
20110122110803.000|20110122110805.000|CC1|SHE CAME INTO THE I.C.U. AND SHE
20110122110805.000|20110122110809.000|CC1|WAS ALERT, AWAKE, CALM.         
20110122110809.000|20110122110812.000|CC1|SHE LOOKED COMFORTABLE.         
20110122110812.000|20110122110813.000|CC1|I THINK WE WERE ALREADY FEELING 
20110122110813.000|20110122110816.000|CC1|SOME INTERACTION, WHICH IS      
20110122110816.000|20110122110816.000|CC1|IMPORTANT.                      
20110122110816.000|20110122110818.000|CC1|SHE'S GOT VERY GOOD MOVEMENT ON 
20110122110818.000|20110122110821.000|CC1|THE LEFT SIDE OF HER BODY.      
20110122110821.000|20110122110824.000|CC1|AND WAS VERY PURPOSEFUL.        
20110122110824.000|20110122110827.000|CC1|AND WE WERE TESTING HER VISION  
20110122110827.000|20110122110828.000|CC1|AND SHE DIDN'T LIKE US SHINING  
20110122110828.000|20110122110829.000|CC1|THE LIGHT IN HER EYE.           
20110122110829.000|20110122110831.000|CC1|AND WANTED TO KEEP THEM CLOSED. 
20110122110831.000|20110122110833.000|CC1|THESE ARE ALL VERY GOOD SIGNS.  
20110122110833.000|20110122110837.000|CC1|SHE ALSO HAD PRETTY GOOD TONE IN
20110122110837.000|20110122110838.000|CC1|HER LEG.                        
20110122110838.000|20110122110841.000|CC1|AND THAT'S AN OFTEN A PRE-CURSOR
20110122110841.000|20110122110844.000|CC1|OF MUCH MORE FUNCTIONAL         
20110122110844.000|20110122110845.000|CC1|RECOVERY.                       
20110122110845.000|20110122110847.000|CC1|IT WAS, AS I SAID SHE JUST      
20110122110847.000|20110122110849.000|CC1|LOOKED SPECTACULAR.             
20110122110849.000|20110122110849.000|CC1|YES?                            
20110122110849.000|20110122110855.000|CC1|>> [INAUDIBLE]                  
20110122110855.000|20110122110858.000|CC1|>> THERE'S VARYING STAGES OF    
20110122110858.000|20110122110859.000|CC1|WHAT WE WOULD CALL EITHER       
20110122110859.000|20110122110902.000|CC1|PARALYSIS OR WEAKNESS.          
20110122110902.000|20110122110904.000|CC1|AND RIGHT NOW, SHE HAS MAYBE    
20110122110904.000|20110122110908.000|CC1|SOME MOVEMENTS OF HER LEGS.     
20110122110908.000|20110122110910.000|CC1|WHEN THERE'S WHAT WE CALL TONE, 
20110122110910.000|20110122110912.000|CC1|SHE MIGHT BE ABLE TO SUPPORT    
20110122110912.000|20110122110912.000|CC1|HERSELF.                        
20110122110912.000|20110122110914.000|CC1|BUT SHE MAY NOT BE ABLE TO MOVE 
20110122110914.000|20110122110916.000|CC1|IT WHEN SHE WANTS.              
20110122110916.000|20110122110917.000|CC1|ON HER ARM AT THIS POINT, WE'RE 
20110122110917.000|20110122110919.000|CC1|NOT SEEING MUCH TONE AND WE'RE  
20110122110919.000|20110122110921.000|CC1|NOT SEEING ANY MOVEMENTS.       
20110122110921.000|20110122110924.000|CC1|BUT THAT'S ONLY ABOUT 30        
20110122110924.000|20110122110925.000|CC1|MINUTES.                        
20110122110925.000|20110122110928.000|CC1|SOME OF HER NURSES HAVE         
20110122110928.000|20110122110929.000|CC1|REPORTED, SHE'S HAD SOME        
20110122110929.000|20110122110932.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS IN TUCSON.            
20110122110932.000|20110122110946.000|CC1|>> [INAUDIBLE]                  
20110122110946.000|20110122110948.000|CC1|>> FIRST, LET ME SAY SHE HAS    
20110122110948.000|20110122110952.000|CC1|GREAT REHABILITATION POTENTIAL. 
20110122110952.000|20110122110953.000|CC1|GREAT REHABILITATION CANDIDATE. 
20110122110953.000|20110122110955.000|CC1|WE WILL KEEP HER BUSY AND SHE

20110122110959.000|20110122111000.000|CC1|WE'LL START RIGHT AFTER THE

20110122111726.000|20110122111729.000|CC1|>> TRACY IS THE NURSE FROM      
20110122111729.000|20110122111733.000|CC1|U.N.C. WHO TRAVELED WITH GABBY

20110122111734.000|20110122111737.000|CC1|TRACY GAVE IT TO HER.

20110122111740.000|20110122111742.000|CC1|HAND.                           
20110122111742.000|20110122111744.000|CC1|I ASKED IF SHE WANTED TO SEE IT.
20110122111744.000|20110122111759.000|CC1|SO I GAVE IT TO HER.            
20110122111759.000|20110122111800.000|CC1|SHE WAS TAKING IT OFF MY HAND
